[[Version 4.2]]
* Fixes an issue whereby after Wriothesley casts his Normal Attack and sprints, when he casts a Normal Attack again shortly after, there is a chance that the counter on his Attack combo will reset.
* Fixes an issue whereby after Wriothesley casts his Normal Attack and sprints, when he casts a Charged Attack again shortly after, there is a chance that he will be unable to cast his Charged Attack.
* Fixes an issue whereby after Wriothesley casts "Rebuke: Vaulting Fist," there is a small chance that Stamina would be consumed abnormally.
